alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Osborne; Phillips; Rooks; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 23 at 3:27AM CDT until April 23 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Rooks County in north central Kansas... Western Jewell County in north central Kansas... Smith County in north central Kansas... Osborne County in north central Kansas... Eastern Phillips County in north central Kansas... Franklin County in south central Nebraska... Webster County in south central Nebraska... Southern Adams County in south central Nebraska... Southern Kearney County in south central Nebraska... Southeastern Harlan County in south central Nebraska... * Until 400 AM CDT. * At 326 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Upland to near Cedar to near Codell, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Upland and Athol around 330 AM CDT. Gaylord around 335 AM CDT. Smith Center, Campbell and Harlan around 340 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Bladen, Bellaire, Lebanon, Blue Hill, Esbon, Ayr and Rosemont. Please note that a High Wind Warning for non-thunderstorm winds remains in effect across the area, and isolated damaging wind gusts could still occur behind this line of thunderstorms. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
